text: DA: “Michigan protest organized by a group co-founded by a GOP state rep and wife—who’s on official Trump campaign ‘Women for Trump’ board and MI Trump Republicans..Co-organizer McNeilly is political adviser to the wealthy DeVos family.”-⁦@YahooNews⁩ https://t.co/kUfzI3Btg0
